message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a fantastic deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $9500?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10250. It's a bit above your target, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $9800?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10100. It's a bit above your target, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
